title: myo-rehab
description: MYO-REHAB (Muscle Recovery) combines advanced Sports Massage and Soft Tissue Therapy with Rehabilitation

title: recover by hyperice
description: Unlock your potential and enhance your movement, preparation and recovery. Recover by Hyperice will enable you to move better by focusing on activating, soothing and loosening your muscles whenever you need it the most. Ideal either before a class, a race, a break whilst WFH to energise and refresh or even as part of your wind down routine before bed to aid recovery. Try the NormaTec compression boots today at Digme Moorgate to take your recovery to the next level.

title: 1 to 1 reformer & rehab pilates
description: This is for a 1 hour private 1 to 1 Reformer & Rehab Pilates session with Aileen.

title: personal training
description: Foundational, functional and inspirational, our personal training focuses on the basics of fitness: building strength, improving cardiovascular fitness, boosting muscular endurance and enhancing mobility.
